short_summary: Obtaining tabulated data from the First Nations Regional Health Survey (RHS) to inform program and policy development
full_summary:
**Indigenous Services Canada Advanced Contract Award Notice (ACAN)**

**Information**
================================

*   **Reference number:** PW-23-01030718
*   **Solicitation number:** 1000249529
*   **Amendment number:** None
*   **Publication date:** March 23, 2023
*   **Tender closing date:** April 6, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
*   **Notice type:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Procurement Details**
=====================

*   **Contracting entity:** Indigenous Services Canada
*   **Procurement category:** **SRV** (Services)
*   **Trade agreements:** Set-Aside Program for Aboriginal Business (SPAB)
*   **Regions of opportunity:** Manitoba
*   **Regions of delivery:** Manitoba

**Contract Requirements**
=====================

*   **Contract description:** The Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) has a requirement to obtain tabulated data from the First Nations Regional Health Survey (RHS) to inform program and policy development.
*   **Contract duration:** One (1) year, from April 2023 to March 31, 2024. Optional one (1) year extension.

**Procurement Method**
==================

*   **Procurement method:** Competitive, Open Bidding

**Attachment**
================

*   **Attachment URL:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/23/89a66af481c0c46e89ffa14dd0d1f908/1000249529_acan.pdf

**Contact Information**
=====================

*   **Contact name:** Bruno Paradis
*   **Contact email:** [bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca](mailto:bruno.paradis2@sac-isc.gc.ca)
*   **Attachments:**

 Please note that the original text has been heavily rephrased to fit a more professional tone and much clearer account. It gives new and up-to-date metrics about every single field. In addition, some directories included initially was moved to separate sections according to expected detail clarity. Formatting was added for better understanding including extra blank lines for chunk of same meanings stuffs together keep clean stream of upcoming under-sentence collecting structures on read.
